questions.quote: Elaine, it was very nice of you to bring the man you're currently sleeping with over to talk to me, but I assure you, I don't have any problem with germs.
I don't care. It was good. I was enjoying it. Had to interfere. Couldn't leave well enough alone. Well, I will get even with you for this. You can count on it.
Hey, I brought you some cigarettes. You buy yourself something nice.
Well what did you want her to do, you left it on the night table.
But there's no way you could have beaten me by that much. I already beaten you in Junior High School three times.
I always look annoyed. Yeah, when you look annoyed all the time, people think that you're busy. Think about it... .
What is the big deal about putting your lips on somebody's face?
What about the oil tanker bladder system? We were going to put an end to maritime oil spills.
For I am in love with Svetlana, and I don't care if the whole world knows, except for Silvio, who would throw me out of the apartment, where I would be dancing on the sidewalk--
Alright, alright, hold on!  Time out! Woah, woah!  What did she say?
